name: Don't Beg for Help
description:
A horror visual novel set in a world where wizards have replaced psychologists.

"Don't beg for Help" is a creepy visual novel about a love triangle between Jill, Jack, and Paul. In an attempt to solve her problems, Jill turns to the wizard Keino for help, but his intervention leads to unexpected and terrible consequences for all three.

The plot is reminiscent of "Tales from the Crypt" and contains 10 different endings, each of which is unique and contains insane twists. If you're a horror fan, "Don't beg for Help" is an excellent choice with a rich plot, a gloomy atmosphere, and a successful mix of magic and reality.

Key features:
  • 10 unique endings
  • Mix of horror, humor and love triangle
  • Story in style of "Tales from the Crypt"
